title: Ransomware Attack
description: Organization-wide ransomware infection causing data encryption and business disruption
controls: EDR deployment, network segmentation, backup procedures

title: Data Breach via Phishing
description: Sensitive data exposure through successful phishing attack
controls: Security awareness training, email filtering, MFA

title: Legacy System Compromise
description: Exploitation of unpatched legacy ERP system

title: Insider Threat
description: Malicious or negligent employee causing data loss

title: Third-Party Breach
description: Vendor compromise leading to supply chain attack

title: Regulatory Non-Compliance
description: Failure to meet GDPR/CCPA requirements resulting in fines
controls: Privacy program, data mapping, DPO appointed

title: Cloud Misconfiguration
description: Exposed cloud resources due to configuration errors
controls: Cloud security posture management, IaC scanning

title: DDoS Attack
description: Service unavailability due to distributed denial of service

title: Physical Security Breach
description: Unauthorized physical access to data center

title: Key Person Dependency
description: Critical knowledge loss if key staff leave

title: Natural Disaster
description: Data center disruption from flood or earthquake

title: API Security Vulnerability
description: Data exposure through insecure API endpoints

title: Password Compromise
description: Account takeover through weak or stolen credentials
